home.description1: eager to put technology, creativity, ergonomics and innovation
home.description1Bold: at the service of the collective interest
home.description2: always up for discussing design, GIS, green & low-tech, product development useful to all and designed for everyone

about.paragraph1: after a master's degree in international relations, I worked for several years in organizations (United Nations, NGOs) as a web and digital communications officer
about.paragraph2: I then turned to web development with a bootcamp and joined a greentech startup where I contributed for 4 years to the design of a carbon footprint SaaS
about.paragraph3: today, I focus on developing tech products designed for both the user and to address social, ecological and digital challenges
